post:
We are **NiceVPS.net** and *`keeping you online is our business`*.

Offering a wide range of _bulletproof VPS_ plans including _FREE DDoS protection_ and _Premium Support_.  
Equipped with powerful enterprise hardware and our _own developed control panel_ called **hPanel**, we propose you the following plans:

##Some of our characteristics and features
✔ LXC or KVM Virtualization  
✔ Pure SSD or SSD-NVMe servers  
✔ Native IPv4 and IPv6  
✔ Anonymous / Privacy service  
✔ Freedom Of Speech: No service blacklists  
✔ Anti DDoS Protection  
✔ Ability to set rDNS records  
✔ Unmetered bandwidth @ 1Gbps connections  
✔ TUN/TAP module  
✔ Redundant HA hardware nodes - >99.99-100% Uptime  
✔ Backups  
✔ Premium support for just €11/year  
✔ Own custom hardware  
✔ OS Installation using ISO (Full Disk Encryption & own ISO Supported)  
✔ hPanel: Own custom billing and control panel  
✔ Major Crypto-Currencies accepted  
✔ Instant and automated  


##Some of our VPS plans:

#LIMITED TIME OFFER: ADD **NVMe SSD** FOR JUST 0.01 EUR MONTH

[**Nice VPS 0.5G**](https://nicevps.net/products/configure/1)  
* LXC or KVM optional  
* 1 x vCore @ 2.20-3.50 Ghz  
* 512MB  
* 10 GB SSD or NVMe optional  
* 500 GB monthly bandwidth @ 1 Gbps  
starting from €1.99/mo. - [Configure Now](https://nicevps.net/products/configure/1)
	
[**Nice VPS 1.0G**](https://nicevps.net/products/configure/2)  
* LXC or KVM optional  
* 1 x vCore @ 2.20-3.50 Ghz  
* 1GB  
* 15GB SSD or NVMe optional  
* 1000 GB monthly bandwidth @ 1 Gbps  
starting from €3.99/mo. - [Configure Now](https://nicevps.net/products/configure/2)

###Take a look at all our other plans at [https://nicevps.net/products/cat/virtual-private-servers](https://nicevps.net/products/cat/virtual-private-servers)  
For a custom and personal quote please contact us at [https://nicevps.net/contact](https://nicevps.net/contact)

We are different: try us out and feel the difference.

##Payments accepted: 
* Bitcoin  
* Litecoin  
* Ethereum
* DASH  
* Monero  
* Ripple  
* Zcash  
* PayPal 
* PerfectMoney   
* Other crypto-currency by request  

Full list can be checked at [https://nicevps.net/index/payments](https://nicevps.net/index/payments)

---

ADDITIONAL 10% OFF  ★ FOR ORDERS OF 10EUR OR MORE: **`10NVMEBARGAIN10`** (available till 2017-09-30)
